title: Riot Act
description: “Scarily good.” ~Lee Child Fear kept people down. Until she helped them make a stand.Charlie is supposed to be dog-sitting for a friend, not leading the resistance, but what’s a girl to do when the woman’s housing estate turns into an urban battlefield?With her motorbike on hand and a big dog by her side, Charlie is more than able to take care of herself, until a ghost from her Army past comes calling. Someone she was trying very hard to forget…
author: Zoë Sharp
